# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  RC_AC_params.cir RC_AC_params.cir.sh RC_AC_params_expr.cir tags exclude RC_AC_params_analytic.cir RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.tags RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.sh DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RC_AC_params.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} RC_AC_params.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} RC_AC_params.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug1043son;ac;expression")
endif()
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} RC_AC_params_analytic.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_1043_SON/RC_AC_params_analytic.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;bug1043son;ac;analytic;expression")
